pkgmetadata.longdescription: Robust Bayesian Copas Selection Model // Fits the robust Bayesian Copas (RBC) selection model of Bai et al. (2020) arXiv:2005.02930 for correcting and quantifying publication bias in univariate meta-analysis. Also fits standard random effects meta-analysis and the Copas-like selection model of Ning et al. (2017) doi:10.1093/biostatistics/kxx004.
